name: MAIN_BLOCK
code:
DATA lt_bsis TYPE TABLE OF bsis.
DATA lt_bseg TYPE TABLE OF bseg.
DATA lt_join TYPE TABLE OF bsad.
DATA lt_acdoca TYPE TABLE OF acdoca.
DATA lt_bkpf TYPE TABLE OF bkpf.
DATA lv_tab TYPE tabname VALUE 'FAGLFLEXA'.
SELECT * FROM bsis INTO TABLE lt_bsis.
UPDATE bseg SET belnr = '1230000001' WHERE bukrs = '1000' AND gjahr = '2024'.
SELECT a~belnr b~gjahr FROM bseg AS a INNER JOIN bsad AS b ON a~belnr = b~belnr INTO TABLE lt_join.
SELECT * FROM acdoca INTO TABLE lt_acdoca.
SELECT * FROM bkpf INTO TABLE lt_bkpf.
